website_summaries.verdict: These streamlined warmers cut out the middleman and clip directly to your ears.
pros: No band, so they don't get in the way of ponytails, hats, hairstyles, and other headgear
Can easily be stored in a jacket pocket
Outer shell, fleece interior lining with two layers of Thinsulate
Comes in a variety of colors and sizes
cons: Cannot wear with earrings much larger than studs

customer_reviews.title: No with glasses
customer_reviews.text: Cannot wear with glasses. This needs to be written in the description
customer_reviews.author: dottij

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, just be sure to measure your ears
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these ear bags for my daughter and she loves them. They fit her ears perfectly. and they keep her ears warm. Be sure to measure your ears before ordering. These do not fit my ears. From 0 to 2 inches is a small, from 2 inches to 2 3/4 " is medium and from 2 3/4" and up is a large.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: The best ear-muffs-ever! DON'T buy the knock-offs!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I can't say enough good things about this product. They are amazing! They slip on easily and stay on 98% of the time. They kept my ears warm even during the -11° days! I liked them so much I ordered a second pair, in pink. My daughter had ordered a pair in black, but unfortunately, they were not Sprigs and not only did they send the wrong size, but the quality was so poor they were useless. These are perfect. As an added aside, they look cute on! I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: g.g. mom of 5, wife of 1, nya to 4

customer_reviews.title: Buy the big ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Ireland and Scotland and used them multiple times. They did a great job of keep the wind out of my ears, which I hate. However, they were too small. My ears fell well within the size medium range, but they squished my ears and were uncomfortable. I bought my son the larges, and when I tried those, they were much more comfortable and did just as good a job of keeping the wind out. So, I highly recommend buying a size up. These are not noise cancelling at all so they do not affect your ability to hear, which is good since that's not their intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: S. Howard

customer_reviews.title: SUPER WARM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, these literally saved me from major cold weather during a trip to NY. I wore these everyday all day walking around in freezing temps (6 degrees!!). My ears were never cold. It was unbelievable!!!! Takes a few minutes to get used to taking them on/off, but once you get it, these are AMAZING!!! Will be ordering more. Also, I ordered all sizes. The small for me and the medium for my husband and son. The large were just too large for all of us. Get them, they are sooo worth it!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: EAR WARMERS
customer_reviews.text: I really like these ear warmers. I’m prone to earaches, & these keeps the cold air out, and doesn’t impair hearing. Only thing is... sometimes it’s hard to snap securely around ear.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Feeling warm on a breezy day.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to reorder these to have in all the pockets of my fall/winter coats. I love how just this small amount of covering makes you feel warmer especially on windy days. They are compact enough to wear under the ear flaps of my Laplander hats when the temperature is really low. Pictured is the size chart from the side of one of the packages that I got for those who are trying to figure out what size to get.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus Hop

customer_reviews.title: Unobtrusive and Soft
customer_reviews.text: These are just the color I wanted and the lack of a headband works for me when I put my hood up or down. However, they can slip off a bit more than I'd like if I'm not careful but overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zalea

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I was just going to get regular earmuffs, but I saw these, and they weren’t too much more expensive, so I thought I’d give them a try. I’m glad I did. They’re really easy to pop on and off, stay on well, are comfortable, and you don’t have to deal with finding a spot for a headband. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Cool head, warm ears, no hat hair!
customer_reviews.text: I review only when I am extremely happy with a product or extremely dissatisfied. This is my fourth or fifth pair of these little gems over the years. Until I discovered Ear Bags I was constantly wrestling with hats that left my head itchy, too hot and left me with with the dreaded 'hat hair'. Banded ear muffs wouldn't stay in place. Ear Bags 'snap' into place and that's it! No itching, no shifting, my ears are never cold and my head is never too hot! I love that they lay flat against my head. If my hair is down, they are not visible. Period. I have found that I can also wear them with ear buds. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable ear warmers
customer_reviews.text: My ears are 2.5 so got the medium. These are so uncomfortable and dont even stick on. Theyre not even fluffy enough for any type of warmth. Highly dissapointed with this purchase and not worth the $15 price tag. I instead ended up purchasing a three dollar foldable genwric brand headphone shaped ear muffins which were WAY better and comfortable than these and have kept my ears super warm with just rhe right amount of fluff.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to size chart
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of earbags. I got them originally because it seemed to be the only thing out there that would work while I'm wearing glasses. First pair I got was medium, and they kept falling off. So I use the medium for sleep and plan to use the small size I got this time for outdoors. They are really comfortable and I don't have trouble hearing and also can talk on the phone fine while wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ihara

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it blew off my ear because a small was too big.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these ear bags! I ordered a small because my ears are only about 2 inches tall (I have small ears for an adult female). They were working great even though they were a little loose. Until today on a hike, one of them blew off in the wind and I couldn’t find it. I would have given these five stars if they had childs sizes or an extra small I could re order.
customer_reviews.author: Cakawa

customer_reviews.title: Really neat product that works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend, unfortunately they were too small. I was very impressed with the quality and the unique way that they work though (it's hard to explain, but it's kind of a "snap on" process). They fit me, so I'm keeping them and have ordered another pair for her.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Measure your ears!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something other than normal ear muffs and these were a good option. I have both a large and a medium pair and can only say make sure to measure your ears!!! I bought the large pair first thinking that they would work best since I thought my ears were on the large side. That worked for a few weeks but then the band inside started to relax a little and then one of them would start to slip off. I like the medium ones better as I like the snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: ian rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Really easy to keep in my purse
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Really easy to keep in my purse. My hair is black, so the ear warmers are not visible when my hair is down. I do not exercise in them, I just wear them to walk my dog or normal walking to/from the car. They stay on pretty well. Occasionally fall off if I am bending a bit. Very comfortable and easy to use. I wear the small without earrings. If I am wearing earrings, I wear the large. I bought both. The bag is an added benefit.
customer_reviews.author: happycustomer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, clever item for their intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I expected them to fit large, as that's what i bought, knowing I was buying bigger than I wear. I was trying these for a pounding noise in my ear from a neurological issue. They are soft and didn't work for that, but they would clearly be great to prevent cold ears. Very easy to slip on and twist and clip. If they fall off, they are the wrong size or the wearer didn't follow instructions provided. Great product, could be worn without worry about blocking traffic noises when exercising outside. I was hoping for more noise-blocking, but they are not meant to block noise, and they don't! Great for their intended purpose!
customer_reviews.author: NelleTex

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ears warm and protected on windy Autumn days.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cream Sprigs, but the color is actually closer to white. They're still very attractive and will match my brown coat and scarf nicely. I found the fit to be quite secure - for size reference, my ears measure 2 inches and the small ones fit perfectly. They are really easy to snap on and off. The earbags aren't insulated, but the outer layer is thick enough to block the Autumn wind.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: TOASTY EARS!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a fibromyalgia sufferer, I HATE cold air blowing. I live in the South and of course in the summer, no matter where you go, the A/C is blasting and freezing. The cold air in restaurants, grocery stores, retail immobilizes me. It wreaks havoc on my sinus, eyes and throat. If I can protect my ears that is half of the battle for me. These are wonderful. They block any type of blowing air. Easy to use and fit securely and are fashionable for one who loves fashion. Would highly recommend. Love that they clip on the ear without any band gong over or behind my head
customer_reviews.author: babysham

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy but fit is a little off.
customer_reviews.text: These little earmuffs are nice and warm and very comfortable to wear. My only issue is the fit. They can be a little difficult to get on just right so they don't fall off. I ordered the medium based on the size chart (I'm right in the middle of the measurement). They don't like to stay around the bottom of my ear, although I have found that wearing a pair of stud earrings helps give them something to grab onto. I feel like they would fit better if they were just a tad smaller but the size small might be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Luvcows

customer_reviews.title: buy the large size
customer_reviews.text: These are ok - i ended up buying a second pair. Men should buy large unless you have small ears. Old people like me should definitely buy size large.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Racz

customer_reviews.title: Keep those ears warm in cold and windy weather.
customer_reviews.text: Great to keep in your pocket during cold months. Work very well in playing sports, allowing full range of motion of your head while keeping your ears warm. When your ears are warm, you can stand the cold much better. Great for avoiding earaches in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Golf girl

customer_reviews.title: Best things ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for many years, but misplaced one so decided to order new pairs. I ordered several pairs - black, red and purple. If you have never used these ear bags I highly recommend. Your hair won't get mussed and they can fit easily in pockets or purse. They come with a little bag to keep them in.
customer_reviews.author: Slam pat

customer_reviews.title: Hilariously dumb but life-changing if you at all like your hair
customer_reviews.text: I proselytize Earbags. Everyone laughs at me when I gush about them, and then end up loving and buying them anyway. These protect your hair and prevent headaches for those of us who are familiar with a life of headbands/earbuds/etc. They pop right onto your ears (subtle if you're a woman with long hair!) and do not muss your hair up if you're walking to work, going on a run, etc. They're teeny and slim so they can fit in any pocket, front flap of a suitcase, etc. Pro tip: a pair of wireless earbuds or AirPods fits perfectly inside and won't accidentally drop out of your ear and into a subway grate. GET THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toasty ears
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Very compact and easy to clip on your ears. Being in the Windy City, these keep my ears perfectly toasty and they hold on tight! They seem to do a great job keeping the wind out. They are very lightweight and you forget they are even on. Measure your ears and get the right fit!
customer_reviews.author: J00LS

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I like these so much that I've ordered them for my husband, daughter and her boyfriend who are all runners. As long as you get your ear all the way tucked in, they stay in place and keep my ears warm when out for a run in cold weather. I can wear them over earbuds. A great product! I've also ordered a pair for a friend who is a non runner and was looking for a good way to keep her ears warm without messing up her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Works but my pair flawed
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept. One of these ear warmers is awesome. They sent two left ears, though (they’re marked on the inside so it must make a difference which side you use it on. Also, one of them does not pop into place like the other. It sticks open and is hard to close over the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Review Girl

customer_reviews.title: I love earbags!
customer_reviews.text: I starting using earbags back in 2008, and never looked back. My ears are very sensitive to pressure changes and wind, and these allow me to go about my day outdoors without having ear pain in the winter. Also, they don't mess up my hair like earmuffs do with the headband attached. These are understated, and I aleays have them in the pocket of my jacket. Also, I am petite with small ears, so the size small works for me, bit I imagine the majprity of women would het a better fit with medium, especially if you wear earrings. I take dangling earrings off when I wear these, but small earrings fit okay. Product arrived right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I hate wearing hats so these ear covers are perfect! They are easy to pop on and off, then tuck into my bag. I love them! They sort of "clip" in place. It takes a couple of tries to get the hang of it but then it's a breeze. They come with their own little bag, too. Great to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: ColoSkier

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are easy to put on, even without a mirror. They work very well for keeping the wind out of my ears and for a long time I don't really even remember that I have them on, until my ears get a little warm if I'm inside.
customer_reviews.author: JVan

customer_reviews.title: These Ear Bags are brilliant
customer_reviews.text: They do the job perfectly. I love that they stay on, they are comfortable, you can forget you have them on. They keep your ears warm but not too hot. I also wear them when it is very windy because wind bothers my ears. I have two pair, one for my sports bag and one pair in the car.
customer_reviews.author: goldengirl47

customer_reviews.title: The concept is ideal; however, the sizing was ...
customer_reviews.text: The concept is ideal; however, the sizing was WAY off. I gave them to a friend. Get the largest you can regardless of your ear size--they "snap" into place so large should fit ANYONE. Pro: very inconspicuous Con: cannot wear with earrings unless they're studs--cannot wear earbuds either--defeats the purpose if working out in the elements.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Best Ear Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order so fast! These are so comfortable and warm and they fit perfect! Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Mixedpets

customer_reviews.title: but in general they work pretty well well
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes tricky to get to flip to the correct orientation, but in general they work pretty well well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: They work but not easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: These are good for keeping the bitter cold wind off your ears. If you have dangling ear lobes you will need to tuck them up to get these on. The hole on the back is much smaller than the overall earmuff. The "snap" into place doesn't really work. It took a bit of fussing to get them to stay in place. For smaller ears I'm sure they work better.
customer_reviews.author: Beergod

customer_reviews.title: I truly love these earbags!
customer_reviews.text: I have vestibular migraines. Air movement of any kind can trigger an attack. I have tried several different brands. This is the only one that actually stay on my ears. I dont even know i have them on. I have even worn them to bed. A wonderful and useful product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Rellinger

customer_reviews.title: They keep me warm.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to wear stocking caps, and I like to have a bill on my hat to shade the bright sun. With my earbags, I can wear a golf or baseball hat and still be warm in even 10 degrees. I hardly know that I am wearing the earbags, except that my ears and head are not cold. They are convenient too. When I go inside, they take up almost no space in my pockets.
customer_reviews.author: greg726

customer_reviews.title: Work great for chemo cold caps - 8 hours at 30 below - awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear a thermogel ice cap each week for chemotherapy (a chemo cold cap) to help prevent hair loss, and the ice caps keep my head and ears at 30 below zero. You are expected to wrap your ears with sanitary napkins and tape it all on to prevent frostbite, and that option was not working at all. These earbags with thinsulate are the perfect option - low profile, easy fit, stay on, keep my ears warm for EIGHT HOURS under very cold conditions. THANK YOU for a great option. If these can protect my ears under those conditions all day, they should be great for any other cold activity.
customer_reviews.author: E. Matulich

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: No headband. Fits snuggly on each ear separately. I must have ears of two different sizes. One ear muff fits tight while the other is slightly, just slightly loose. They can be adjusted with a pliable plastic band tucked inside; I just need to work with it a little more. Overall, very happy and may buy more. Yes, I recommended these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ear Protection from Cold
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on a recent trip and there was snow and cold winds. My ears were toasty warm and could hear perfectly with them on. Also gave as gifts to early morning walkers and fisherman and they also stated earbags worked!
customer_reviews.author: bigflower

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I ever lived without these things! I got a pair as a Christmas gift a few years ago and didn't think too much about them. My commute is walking and taking a train and I live in the northeast where it gets cold. I can wear the ear bags under hats and hoods and they keep my ears warm, which helps to make me feel warmer. If I don't want to wear a hat, I just put them on and they really make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Cheetahkatt

customer_reviews.title: Fell off the first time I wore them
customer_reviews.text: I have large ears. So I was happy to see that the Earbags had several sizes, making them more likely to stay on. I just used them for the first time for my first bike ride, and one is somewhere where I had been riding, and the other one landed on my jacked as I was taking my helmet off. They seemed to be warm...as long as I was able to keep them on, which amounted to less than an hour. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Martin A. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Not quite developed yet.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite ready for the real world! These Earbags are a very cool idea, but they just do not fit secure enough to stay in place or keep your ears warm. Maybe consider using elastic?! Ear sizing does not help with fit either.
customer_reviews.author: FSU Fam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Once they get on they are good to go and I can hear people talking, but they were not very easy for me to just snap on as I thought they would. Maybe I need more practice I live in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Starlite3

customer_reviews.title: No headaches with these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I laughed at the name and I laughed at the idea of these little contraptions. However, I was in total awe of their functionality! These are magical! Not headache from a band wrapped around my head and no messed up hair. My ears stay warm and they stay on VERY securely. I ordered a second pair for my daughter. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Love these, bought several pairs for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Love these, bought several pairs for my kids. My grand daughter asked me what are those things on your ears grandma ? So I told her they are Ear bags, and she wanted to try them, well I never got them back, so I ordered a pair for all of us. These work great sitting in the stands watching softball game or watching track. You can still when you are wearing them too.
customer_reviews.author: Sheltie Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I hike a lot in cold weather and my ears always get cold but if I have a hat on or ear wrap I get TOO HOT. These are PERFECT!!! They really do stay on (make sure you get the right size!) and I get many compliments on them. About to order another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Because earmuffs are annoying.
customer_reviews.text: I wear glasses and have frequent headaches, so I hate earmuffs that clamp onto my head or press in my ears. These don't do that, they keep my ears toasty, are easy to put on and take off, and don't interfere with my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: raeesmerelda

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: The first day I received these, I was able to put them on. Afterwards I couldn't figure out how to put them on. Not even worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: jesuis

customer_reviews.title: They fall off,
customer_reviews.text: They’re a great idea but they fall off. And I really tried every which way to make them stay on. I’d say I have decent skills when it comes to this sort of thing, but alas, I was disappointed. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea. They fit well especially with my glasses, except when I wear big earrings. They are easy to snap on and off. It hasn't been cold enough to wear them yet, however, I have worn them around the house if it gets too cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara B.

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance (price was scary) So happy I did.
customer_reviews.text: I have cold ears - ALWAYS Even in the summer my ears get cold when riding a bike or a brisk walk with a slight breeze. Don't let the price stop you. They are worth it. At least for my cold miserable ears. They are light yet sturdy. Easy to put on and they don't fall off. Sometimes I forget that I have them on when I go into a store and I can still hear perfectly. No raising of voices needed. I now own 2 pair. One inside the house and one in the car.
customer_reviews.author: hard to please

customer_reviews.title: Ladies, watch the video before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine. Be aware that if you wear glasses, getting these little things on will be a challenge if you're out and about. Do you put your glasses in a pocket? Hang them from the neck of your T-shirt? The "how-to-use" demo video doesn't show a woman wearing glasses...or hoop earrings, which would also need to be removed. You might want to reconsider earmuffs with a headband.
customer_reviews.author: Mah Jongg Maven

customer_reviews.title: I’ve needed these my whole life
customer_reviews.text: Where have you been all my life! I have extreme sensitivity to cold wind and get an inner ear ache that brings me to my knees! NOT ANY MORE! Great great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lam

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Ear Muffs!
customer_reviews.text: I have used ear bags for years. This is my 3rd or 4th pair. I have always liked ear muffs; however, I did not like the band that went over your head. These are so comfortable and warm. I have had many people ask about them when I would be out. I recommend these to anyone who does not like to have their head covered but wants to keep their ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce East

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: I recently went back to a pixie cut and forgot how quickly my ears would get cold in the winter. I have been using these ear warmers for about 2 weeks and I really like them. They do exactly what I bought them to do. I would have given them 5 stars, but the one con so far is they are itchy. That may be because i have sensitive skin, not sure, but I find after having them on for 20 minutes or so, the tops of my ears get itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Bri B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your ears warm.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Not only are ear muffs hard to find where I live but they never stay on my head and usually hurt my ears. These don't hurt and it's nice to be able to keep my ears warm. I would recommend measuring your ears before you order. I have small ears and the smallest ones fit perfect. Would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Regret the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Count me the court of not liking these at all. They just don't fit snug enough and with wind, they leak too much air even under my hat. I didn't save the packaging, so I'll just donate them... I'm sure they work for some folk, but I would caution to save packaging until you are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and useful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 65 year old mother who uses them often. They work well keeping her warm and keeping the wind from bothering her which causes her to experience dizziness.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Montpetit

customer_reviews.title: So practical and pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: Keep my ears very warm and I can still hear!! Stay in place, wash well and even fit under my hat because my ears still get cold at the very tip
customer_reviews.author: Kay Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Careful not to lose one!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Be careful not to lose one though because they're really light weight. I thought I lost one but later found it on the floor in my closet, so now I keep them in the inside coat pocket where I might not pull one out accidentally when getting my phone or gloves out of a regular pocket. They work like a charm. I'm always looking for new or weird products. And I love the looks I get when people think the earbags are just floating over my ears before I tell them what they are and how they work.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly K

customer_reviews.title: These are very warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got me a pair for chilly mornings playing golf. I love them, so comfortable. I got her a pair as she loved mine. I would recommend these to any one that doesn't want something bulky and confining to keep there ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good Accident
customer_reviews.text: I honestly ordered these by mistake. I thought they were a normal pair of earmuffs. They do however work better than any pair of normal earmuffs have ever worked before. They keep my ears warm so they do their job. I only wish they were easier to get on and off. When I explain to people how to wear them they struggle for a few mins. They work fine for me though. Really glad I made this accidental purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a trip to New York over Christmas and they were so convenient. I could put them in a pocket and the second I needed them they were right there. It was also nice that they wouldn't mess with my glasses like the ones that have the band behind the head. They aren't the warmest ear warmers you could buy but if you're mainly going in and out of buildings or not spending the entire day outside in freezing temperatures they work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for cold ears
customer_reviews.text: I could not live without Earbags. Cold wind blowing into my ears really hurts, but Earbags prevent the wind from entering while keeping ears toasty warm! I no longer have earaches whenever I go outside in the winter! Best invention!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I get earaches often so need to wear ear muffs. I tried the one behind my head but they kept falling off. I also have the ones that go on my head - made me look like princess lea. These are perfect. A little learning to get them on, but once they’re on they fit well and are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Judi Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: It’s not staying on my ear at all!! I got the medium and the large they both fall off on 10 seconds! Keep looking
customer_reviews.author: P. Grunchich

customer_reviews.title: Light but nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It’s convenient and useful. Not too heavy. And as a plus, it kind of works with AirPods pro so I can still listen to music but keep ears warm!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these gloves, but...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great idea in theory, but they have no ear support or warmth. I think they're really more of a gimmick than anything else. I wanted to like these, but there are just too many flaws. The plastic piece that's supposed to close around your ear to secure them is very uncomfortable. Also made of cheap material. The "Springs" logo was peeling as soon as they arrived. Not a product for me. However, shipping was fast and everything arrived in good condition. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: KrisK.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife wears one on her left ear every day due to temperature sensitivity. They keep he comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Room For Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar product, different brand, many years ago and they would not stay on. I was hoping over the years the design would have been improved. I am an adult with ears on the small size. I originally bought the medium size and returned them for the small. If I put them on with great care, and don't bump them after they are on, I have found they do work. They are reasonably priced, provide warmth for my ears when I don't want to wear a hat, but they will never replace a warm hat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the ears warm!
customer_reviews.text: Will be ordering more of these for myself and for gifts. Great product and they really keep your ears warm without messing up your hair with a hat if you don't want to wear one.
customer_reviews.author: shopwife

customer_reviews.title: Warm ears without a hat or a band clamping my head. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find these on the market. Had two pair years ago and have been wishing I could fnd another set. Fit like a glove and stay put. Warm ears without a hat or a band clamping my head. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: student63

customer_reviews.title: I wish i had ordered these sooner
customer_reviews.text: I personally love these things - my ears get cold and it makes me colder, so snap these things on and i'm very happy. My only suggestion would be to make more shades of colors so they aren't as noticeable on some people. But, for me, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Roan

customer_reviews.title: Had to show 1 star on ratign but didn't wan to.
customer_reviews.text: Thought these would be JUST THE THING for the cold weather. What a waste of money. Ordered the men's large figuring they would fit, WRONG? Even if they did, not sure how I would ever get them on as the lining, I am guessing to help them keep their shape and help hold them on were so stiff I can't imagine HOW anyone could wear them comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: GaryL

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have severe ear problems and the cold air KILLS my ears. Regular hats and ear muffs still allow cold air through, but not these. I have worn them for years and love them. I had my last pair for 3 years and am just now replacing them. They do work better if you wear them on the same ear all them time as they tend to conform to your ear. Also, bend them back slightly by holding the so that the inside is facing you and bending away from you just a bit. They will then fit tighter on your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: brilliant product!
customer_reviews.text: i live in these things! ears always cold in the pacific northwest...and they block completely with just a pop on and off...genius whoever invented these things...love love love them!
customer_reviews.author: Denise P.

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Ears Warm
customer_reviews.text: These are great to wear in windy weather. The work fine, and without that annoying headband. My only wish would be that they were furry and cozy inside.
customer_reviews.author: Leonore Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Want your ears mangled and red? Then buy this!
customer_reviews.text: These look comfortable, BUT when they are clipped into position they mangle your outer ear. Cute and gimmicky, but not comfortable and your ears are red and sore after 15 minutes of use. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, great product!
customer_reviews.text: At last, a way to keep my ears warm without wrecking my hair. I've not worn them outside yet, but they're a perfect fit and they stay in place. Thanks to the genius who came up with the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Czicka

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable. But falls off often
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product if you are okay with falling off your ears every 5-10 min in a windy day.
customer_reviews.author: liska

customer_reviews.title: They slip off
customer_reviews.text: They do not stay on well, they slip off. They are perfect to wear under a hat which is how I use them. I do have small ears but I did purchase the small ones so...
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: subtle ear protection
customer_reviews.text: I acquired my first set of Earbags on a trip to NYC. When I lost one a few months ago (don't attempt to wear ear buds under them) I tried a headband, which turned out to be too wide and required awkward folding to keep out of my eyes. In desperation I finally ordered another set of Earbags. They're easy to carry in a purse or pocket, and stay put—without ear buds of course. Bonus: They protect my ears from WY wind without ruining my hair.
customer_reviews.author: BreeD

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am a very petitie woman so I ordered the "small." I would say that small would probably be best for children. They fit me but could be a bit larger. I'm wondering if the medium might be too big though. I do absolutely love them though! A friend of mine had a pair and I was psyched to get some of my own. I wear them every day with this crazy cold weather we are having and I'm so glad I got them because they fit right under my hat and keep my ears nice and toasty.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Who thought of this anyway?
customer_reviews.text: Just moved back to Alaska and saw someone wearing these and HAD to have a pair. I love them. They stay on and keep my ears nice and warm. I have fairly short hair, brown in color, and no one even notices these brown earbags when I have them on!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice for those cool breezy early morning walks on the beach !
customer_reviews.author: Merna

customer_reviews.title: great little ear warmers
customer_reviews.text: arrived in good shape, in a timely manner and appreciate having ear warmers without a headband.
customer_reviews.author: olson

customer_reviews.title: Earbag Evangelist!
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit silly, but so perfect! I don't always want to wear a hat under my bike helmet, but my ears always get irritated from the wind - these are the perfect solution! I have tiny ears, and the small works perfectly, even with my stud earrings. I've become an earbag evangelist - you should buy these!
customer_reviews.author: jro

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I like them a-lot. They're small enough, I just keep 'em in my jacket pocket. They don't mess with my hair. Not that it matters what others think but... I get a-lot of inqueery as to how they work; along with interest as to where I bought 'em. I like my investment.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for daughter. She loves them. Gets compliments all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought several pair fit nice warm nice bag to but them in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A Miller

customer_reviews.title: The greatest!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I discovered these-have ordered many as gifts and for myself. Makes winter a lot more tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: MerryMania

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stay keep shape
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in October 2017. As an adult I used them once a day only when windy. Within 3months they won’t snap and stay on my ears and I literally need to put a hat on to keep them on. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carry pouch as well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for everyone that visits us here at the North Shore of Boston. Even wear them in Spring and Fall as we walk the windy beaches. Guests know we have them here and always ask for them when they head for the beach! Great carry pouch as well, slips right in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reader

customer_reviews.title: Keep your ears cozy and look good doing it!
customer_reviews.text: These are very warm and low profile. You really don't notice them when looking at yourself from the front (assuming you get a color that blends with your hair). Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality compared to some I wore in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to get on and stay on
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get them to stay on and sometimes can’t even get them on. Painful even to try to get them on my small ears. Worthless
customer_reviews.author: Aqua Flora

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money on this product!
customer_reviews.text: Poor at best! Weak and flimsy. Ear coverage and ability to stay on was terrible. The add to purchase this item is not telling enough to provide you correct size or coverage for your ears. They don’t keep your ears warm and they do not stay on your ears!! Booooooo!!!
customer_reviews.author: Niner

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE EARBAGS!  Be sure you purchase only this brand, EarBAGS.  The product with a slightly differenty name is not as good.
customer_reviews.text: I love Earbags. I've used them for years. I love having my ears covered in the winter now that I have short hair. I appreciate not having to have something clamped onto my head or messing up my hairdo. PURCHASE ONLY THIS BRAND--Earbags. Unfortunately, I once purchased a knock-off made in the US and it did not work as well, the quality was different.
customer_reviews.author: NatureDoc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the cold weather
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for the winter and especially the wind and yet you can still hear everything. They fit as expected and are a nice small profile not like bulky ear muffs.
customer_reviews.author: lisa robinson

product_meta.title: Sprigs Earbags Bandless Ear Warmers/Earmuffs with Thinsulate
feature_bullets: WARM & WINDPROOF – All Sprigs Earbags bandless ear warmers are built with a fleece interior lining. Between the fleece lining and the outer shell there are two layers of Thinsulate to help block out wind from going through the ear warmer.

BANDLESS – Stop messing up your hair! Unlike the majority of ear warmers out there that have a wrap around design, the Sprigs Earbags do not. Our sleek design provides warmth without sacrificing your look. For those with longer hair Earbags tuck away nicely behind your hair, it’s hard to notice you even have them on.

PATENTED SNAP ON TECHNOLOGY- Earbags are built with a patented “Snap On” technology. Each package comes with an ear warmer that snaps onto each ear. This compact design allows for easy storage and transportation. Most customers order a few pairs and leave a set of Earbags in each jacket so they are always readily available. Store in a closed position to maintain proper fit.

LIGHTWEIGHT PERFORMANCE- Earbags lightweight design make them the perfect accessory for outside cold weather activities. Some popular activities customers use Earbags for include but are not limited to: running, skiing, cycling, ice skating, snowboarding, etc. Check out our HIVIZ styles for those of you who active at night and need that increased visibility.

SIZING- Earbags come in three sizes. Sizing is important to make sure that Earbags fit comfortably and stay on securely. 80% of adults fit in Medium and Large sizes.SMALL is mainly for Children. Please follow the sizing chart and get an accurate sizing of your ear: Small: under 2 inches, Medium: 2 inches -2.75 inches, Large: over 2.75 inches. Works with studs and small hoop earrings, we do not suggest wearing them with bulkier earrings such as large hoops.
